name: LONER'S SPELL
description:
Loner's spell is an illustrated nonlinear poem and recovery spell for strength of will.

Preferably recited in dim light, with tears contained in the spell's receiver eyes.
If the tears are charged by fury, they must walk the west path. 
If they are charged by grief, they must take the south path. 

More can be added to the ritual at the enchanter's will.
